content: after working the instep ladder of the previous row to close the gap sts do not work the remaining 14 16 18 pick up and knit 14 16 18 sts along the sts of the round right side of the heel flap k9 10 11 sts place marker for bor 76 86 96 sts total heel flap round 1 k to 3 sts before marker k2tog the heel flap is worked across the following k1 work the next 28 32 36 sts using the 28 32 36 sts turn at the end of each row next row of instep pattern k1 ssk k to bor marker 2 sts decreased row 1 *sl1 k1 * repeat from * to * to end of row removing bor marker round 2 k to marker sl marker work the next 28 32 36 sts using the next row of the row 2 sl1 p27 31 35 instep pattern sl marker k to bor marker repeat row 1-2 for 13 15 17 more times 2 © goose creek knits 2021 repeat rounds 1 and 2 until 56 64 72 sts round 2 *k to 3 sts before marker k2tog remain remove gusset markers k1 sl marker k1 ssk * repeat from * to * again k to bor marker continue to work round 2 until the foot measures 6 7 8 / 15 17 5 20 cm or 2 / round 3 *k to marker sl marker * repeat 5cm less than desired length from * to * again k to bor marker toe repeat rounds 2 and 3 until 20 24 28 sts remain round 1 k14 16 18 place marker k28 finishing 32 36 place marker k to bor marker graft toe sts together using kitchener stitch weave in ends and lightly block if desired instep pattern the instep pattern is worked across 28 32 36 sts row 1 k4 6 8 *p2 k1 p2 k3 * repeat from * to * 2x more k0 2 4 row 2 k4 6 8 *p1 k3 p1 k3 * repeat from * to * 2x more k0 2 4 row 3 k4 6 8 *p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k3* repeat from * to * 2x more k0 2 4 row 4 repeat row 2 abbreviations bor beginning of round k2tog knit 2 stitches sl slip_stitch purlwise together with yarn held on wrong side of work dpn s double point p purl ssk slip 2 stitches needle s purlwise then knit them together k knit p2tog purl 2 stitches st s stitch es together 3 © goose creek knits 2021 emily s cardamom tea recipe enjoy this lightly spiced tea while you make or wear your socks total time 7 minutes makes 1 cup ingredients 1 ¼ cups water 300 ml 3 whole cardamom pods 1 cinnamon stick 3 inches/ 8cm 1 tea bag or 1 heaping teaspoon of loose leaf tea 1 teaspoon sugar optional instructions 1 heat the water cardamom pods and cinnamon
